channel.title: Give The Drummer Some - WFMU
channel.description: Doug Schulkind's eclectic radio show from WFMU featuring Micronesian doo-wop, Appalachian mambo, and more. Fridays 9am-Noon EST.
channel.ns0:author: Doug Schulkind / WFMU
